summary.span: 表示 控件中显示的菜单项。

span.span: Represents a menu item displayed in the control.

summary.span: 无法继承此类。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件由 对象表示的菜单项的层次结构组成。A control is made up of a hierarchy of menu items represented by objects. 每个菜单项都具有一个只读的 属性，该属性指定在 控件中显示菜单项的级别。Each menu item has a read-only property that specifies the level at which the menu item is displayed in the control. 顶层（级别0）上没有父菜单项的菜单项称为根菜单项。Menu items at the top level (level 0) that do not have a parent menu item are called root menu items. 具有父菜单项的菜单项称为子菜单项。A menu item that has a parent menu item is called a submenu item. 所有根菜单项都存储在 集合中。All root menu items are stored in the collection. 子菜单项存储在父菜单项的 集合中。Submenu items are stored in a parent menu item's collection. 您可以使用 属性访问菜单项的父菜单项。You can access a menu item's parent menu item by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 和 集合只包含下一级别的菜单项。The and collections contain only the menu items for the next level down. 若要在菜单树的下方访问菜单项，请使用后续菜单项的 属性。To access menu items further down the menu tree, use the property of a subsequent menu item. 若要创建 控件的菜单项，请使用以下方法之一：To create the menu items for a control, use one of the following methods: 使用声明性语法创建静态菜单项。Use declarative syntax to create static menu items. 使用构造函数动态创建 类的新实例。Use a constructor to dynamically create new instances of the class. 然后，可以将这些 对象添加到 或 集合。These objects can then be added to the or collection. 将 控件绑定到数据源。Bind the control to a data source. 控件绑定到 控件时，会自动创建与数据源中的项相对应的 对象。When the control is bound to a control, objects are automatically created that correspond to the items in the data source. 对于其他数据源，还会自动创建与数据源的层次结构相匹配的 对象;但是，还必须使用 集合来定义菜单项绑定，这些绑定指定菜单项和其对应数据项之间的绑定关系。For other data sources, objects are also automatically created that match the hierarchy structure of data source; however, you must also use the collection to define the menu item bindings that specify the binding relationship between a menu item and its corresponding data item. 菜单项显示在静态菜单或动态菜单中，具体取决于其级别。The menu items are displayed in either a static menu or a dynamic menu, depending on its level. 静态菜单始终显示在 控件中。The static menu is always displayed in a control. 默认情况下，顶级（级别0）上的菜单项显示在静态菜单中。By default, the menu items at the top level (level 0) are displayed in the static menu. 通过设置 "" 属性，可以在静态菜单中显示其他菜单级别（静态子菜单）。You can display additional menu levels (static submenus) within the static menu by setting the property. 具有高于 属性指定的值的菜单项（如果有）将显示在动态子菜单中。Menu items (if any) with a higher level than the value specified by the property are displayed in a dynamic submenu. 仅当用户将鼠标指针置于包含动态子菜单的父菜单项上时，才会显示动态子菜单。A dynamic submenu appears only when the user positions the mouse pointer over the parent menu item that contains a dynamic submenu. 当用户单击菜单项时， 控件可以导航到链接的网页，或只是回发到服务器。When the user clicks a menu item, the control can either navigate to a linked Web page or simply post back to the server. 如果设置了菜单项的 属性，则 控件将导航到链接页;否则，它会将该页面回发到服务器进行处理。If the property of a menu item is set, the control navigates to the linked page; otherwise, it posts the page back to the server for processing. 默认情况下，链接页显示在与 控件相同的窗口或框架中。By default, a linked page is displayed in the same window or frame as the control. 若要在不同的窗口或框架中显示链接的内容，请使用 控件的 属性。To display the linked content in a different window or frame, use the property of the control. > [!NOTE] > 属性会影响控件中的每个菜单项。The property affects every menu item in the control. 若要为单个菜单项指定窗口或框架，请直接设置 对象的 属性。To specify a window or frame for an individual menu item, set the property of the object directly. 每个菜单项都有 和 属性。Each menu item has a and a property. 属性的值将显示在 控件中，而 属性用于存储有关菜单项的任何其他数据，如传递到与菜单项关联的回发事件的数据。The value of the property is displayed in the control, while the property is used to store any additional data about the menu item, such as data passed to the postback event associated with the menu item. 如果设置 属性，但不设置 属性， 属性会自动设置为与 属性相同的值。If you set the property, but leave the property unset, the property is automatically set with the same value as the property. 反之亦然。The opposite is also true. 如果设置 属性，但不是 属性， 属性会自动设置为与 属性相同的值。If you set the property, but not the property, the property is automatically set with the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > 同一菜单级别上的菜单项必须分别具有 属性的唯一值; 控件无法区分同一级别上具有相同值的不同菜单项。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. 在这种情况下，如果用户单击的菜单项具有重复的值，则会选择菜单中第一个出现的菜单项。In this scenario, if the user clicks a menu item that has a duplicate value, the menu item that appears first in the menu is selected. 若要在用户将鼠标指针放在菜单项上时显示工具提示，请设置该项的 属性。To display a ToolTip when the user positions the mouse pointer over a menu item, set the item's property. 控件具有几种不同类型的菜单项。A control has several different types of menu items. 您可以使用下表中的属性来控制不同菜单项类型的样式（如字体大小和颜色）。You can control the style (such as font size and color) for the different menu item types by using the properties in the following table. |菜单项样式属性Menu item style property|说明Description| |------------------------------|-----------------| ||当鼠标指针置于动态菜单项上时，动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual dynamic menu item.| ||动态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a dynamic menu.| ||当前选定动态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected dynamic menu item.| ||当鼠标指针置于静态菜单项上时该菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu item when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| ||单个静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for an individual static menu item.| ||静态菜单的样式设置。The style settings for a static menu.| ||当前选定的静态菜单项的样式设置。The style settings for the currently selected static menu item.| 您可以使用下表中显示的样式集合来指定基于菜单项级别应用于菜单项的样式，而不是设置各个样式的属性。Instead of setting the individual style properties, you can specify styles that are applied to menu items based on their level by using the style collections shown in the following table. |级别样式集合Level style collections|说明Description| |-----------------------------|-----------------| ||根据菜单项级别控制菜单项样式的 对象的集合。A collection of objects that control the style of the menu items based on their level.| || 对象的集合，这些对象根据选定菜单项的级别来控制其样式。A collection of objects that control the style of selected menu items based on their level.| ||根据子菜单项级别控制子菜单项样式的 对象的集合。A collection of objects that control the style of the submenu items based on their level.| 集合中的第一种样式对应于菜单树中第一个深度级别的菜单项样式。The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the first depth level in the menu tree. 集合中的第二个样式对应于菜单树中第二个深度级别的菜单项的样式，依此类推。The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the menu items at the second depth level in the menu tree, and so on. 这通常用于生成目录样式的导航菜单，其中特定深度的菜单项应具有相同外观，无论它们是否具有子菜单。This is most often used to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where menu items at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have submenus. > [!NOTE] > 如果使用上表中列出的任何级别样式集合来定义 控件的样式，则这些样式设置将覆盖各个菜单项样式属性。If you use any of the level style collections listed in the previous table to define the style for the control, these style settings override the individual menu item style properties. 除了自定义菜单项样式以外，还可以自定义菜单项的外观。In addition to customizing a menu item's style, you can also customize its appearance. 您可以通过设置下表中的属性，为菜单项的不同部分指定自定义图像。You can specify custom images for the different parts for a menu item by setting the properties in the following table. |Image 属性Image property|说明Description| |--------------------|-----------------| ||显示在菜单项文本旁边的可选图像。An optional image displayed next to the text of a menu item.| ||显示在菜单项中的可选图像，用于指示菜单项具有动态子菜单。An optional image displayed in a menu item to indicate that the menu item has a dynamic submenu.| ||显示在菜单项底部的可选图像，用于将其与其他菜单项隔开。An optional image displayed at the bottom of a menu item to separate it from other menu items.| 若要确定当前是否在 控件中选择了菜单项，请使用 属性。To determine whether a menu item is currently selected in a control, use the property. 还可以通过使用 属性来确定是否已将菜单项绑定到数据。You can also determine whether a menu item is bound to data by using the property. 如果菜单项绑定到数据，则可以使用 属性访问绑定到菜单项的数据项的值。If a menu item is bound to data, you can use the property to access the values of the data item bound to the menu item. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用声明性语法将 控件填充为静态 对象。The following example demonstrates how to populate a control with static objects using declarative syntax. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/CS/menuitemcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItem#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItem/VB/menuitemvb.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示如何将 控件绑定到 控件。The following example demonstrates how to bind a control to a control. 绑定到数据源时， 控件会自动创建 对象。When bound to a data source, the control automatically creates the objects. 要使此示例正常工作，您必须将下面的示例站点地图数据复制到名为 web.sitemap 的文件中。For this example to work correctly, you must copy the sample site map data below to a file named Web.sitemap. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/CS/menudatabindcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuDataBind#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuDataBind/VB/menudatabindvb.aspx#1)] 下面是前面示例的示例站点地图数据。The following is sample site map data for the previous example. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` ``

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建 类的新实例，而不使用菜单文本或值。Use this constructor to create a new instance of a class without menu text or a value. > [!NOTE] > 使用此构造函数时， 对象中的所有属性都将设置为其默认值。When this constructor is used, all properties in the object are set to their default values. 创建对象后，请确保根据需要设置属性。Be sure to set the properties, as necessary, after creating the object. 此构造函数通常在动态填充 控件的 集合或 对象的 集合时使用。This constructor is commonly used when dynamically populating the collection of a control or the collection of a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建 类的新实例。The following example demonstrates how to use this constructor to create a new instance of the class. 然后，使用 对象动态填充 控件中的菜单项。The object is then used to dynamically populate the menu items in a control. summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示菜单项的关联网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: Gets or sets the target window or frame in which to display the Web page content associated with a menu item.

value.span: 显示所链接的网页内容的目标窗口或框架。

span.span: The target window or frame in which to display the linked Web page content.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，该值刷新具有焦点的窗口或框架。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性指定在单击菜单项时要在其中显示其链接到菜单项的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。Use the property to specify the window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. 值必须以 A 到 Z 范围内的字母（不区分大小写）打头，但某些以下划线打头的特殊值除外，如下表所示：Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for certain special values that begin with an underscore, as shown in the following table. 请注意，设置此属性将覆盖此菜单项的 控件的 属性。Note that setting this property overrides the property of the control for this menu item. |目标值Target value|说明Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|将内容呈现在一个没有框架的新窗口中。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|将内容呈现在上一个框架集父级中。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜索窗格中呈现内容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|将内容呈现在含焦点的框架中。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|将内容呈现在没有框架的全窗口中。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 请查看浏览器文档，确定是否支持 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更高版本支持 `_search` 目标值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. > [!NOTE] > 属性作为 `target` 属性呈现。The property is rendered as a `target` attribute. 不允许在 XHTML 1.1 strict 文档类型定义中使用定位点元素上的 `target` 属性。The `target` attribute on anchor elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 strict document type definition. 如果 的呈现输出必须符合 XHTML 1.1，则不设置 属性。Do not set the property if the rendered output for the must be XHTML 1.1-compliant. 有关详细信息，请参阅[Visual Studio 中的 XHTML 标准和 ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97). > > 创建可访问的网页时，强烈建议你避免使用 "" 属性以面向其他窗口。When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended you avoid using the property to target another window. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的辅助功能](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 属性指定在单击菜单项时显示链接到菜单项的 Web 内容的窗口或框架。The following example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a window or frame in which to display the Web content linked to a menu item when that menu item is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemTarget/CS/menuitemtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemTarget/VB/menuitemtargetvb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于通过存储与菜单项关联的任何其他数据来对 属性进行补充。The property is used to supplement the property by storing any additional data associated with the menu item. 此值不会显示在控件中，通常用于存储用于处理回发事件的数据。This value is not displayed in the control and is commonly used to store data for handling postback events. > [!NOTE] > 如果 属性包含 `null`，则 `get` 访问器返回 属性的值。If the property contains `null`, the `get` accessor returns the value of the property. 如果 属性又包含 `null`，则返回 。If the property, in turn, contains `null`, is returned. 当在 属性中指定的值路径生成时，也会使用 属性的值。The value of the property is also used when the value path specified in the property is generated. 值路径是由分隔符分隔的菜单项值的列表，它们构成了从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。A value path is a delimiter-separated list of menu item values that forms a path from the root menu item to the current menu item. 值路径用于指示菜单项在 控件中的位置。The value path is used to indicate the position of a menu item in a control. > [!NOTE] > 同一菜单级别上的菜单项必须分别具有 属性的唯一值; 控件无法区分同一级别上具有相同值的不同菜单项。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和[全球化和本地化](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何在用户选择菜单项时显示菜单项及其父级的 。The following example demonstrates how to display the for a menu item and its parent when the user selects a menu item. public: property System::String ^ ValuePath { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。

span.span: Gets the path from the root menu item to the current menu item.

value.span: 由分隔符分隔的菜单项值的列表，它构成了从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。

span.span: A delimiter-separated list of menu item values that form a path from the root menu item to the current menu item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含分隔符分隔的菜单项值列表，这些值构成了从根菜单项到当前菜单项的路径。The property contains a delimiter-separated list of menu item values that form a path from the root menu item to the current menu item. 值路径用于指示菜单项在 控件中的位置。The value path is used to indicate the position of a menu item in a control. 您可以使用 属性指定用来分隔菜单项值的分隔符字符。You can specify the delimiter character used to separate the menu item values by using the property. 此值通常在分析各个值的列表时使用，或者作为参数传递给 类的 方法。This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values, or to pass as an argument to the method of the class. 根据 控件中显示的值，可能需要更改分隔符字符以防止任何冲突。Depending on the value displayed in the control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts. 例如，如果将分隔符字符设置为逗号，则显示的值不应包含任何逗号;否则，无法准确分析 属性。For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed value should not contain any commas; otherwise, you cannot accurately parse the property. > [!NOTE] > 从根菜单项到当前菜单项的每个菜单项的 属性的值将用于生成值路径。The values of the property of each menu item from the root menu item to the current menu item are used to generate the value path. 同一菜单级别上的菜单项必须分别具有 属性的唯一值; 控件无法区分同一级别上具有相同值的不同菜单项。Menu items at the same menu level must each have a unique value for the property; the control cannot distinguish between different menu items at the same level that have the same value. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将值解析为单个菜单项值的 属性。The following example demonstrates how to parse the value to the property for the individual menu item values. [!code-aspx-csharp[MenuItemValuePath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValuePath/CS/menuitemvaluepathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MenuItemValuePath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MenuItemValuePath/VB/menuitemvaluepathvb.aspx#1)]
